items.headline: Assess your organization's readiness & maturity for design & innovation | Includes 4 case studies
objectives_summary: You will understand how they can pursue an innovation journey or how to develop a new product or service using the design thinking framework.
You will understand that Design Thinking is an approach used for practical and creative problem-solving.
You will learn that Design Thinking is extremely user-centric, It focuses on humans first and foremost, seeking to understand people’s needs

items.headline: What You Need To Become A Successful Practice Manager
objectives_summary: Students will have a clear understanding of the manager role and responsibilities in a office
Students will understand what skills a successful practice manager needs to master to become better in this role

items.title: Managing social media in the workplace
items.headline: Managing the impact and risks of staff social media use at work
objectives_summary: know common social media platforms and social networking tools
understand how and why people use social media
identify the key risks posed to employers and businesses by social media use and misuse

You will learn how to kill distractions

items.title: Introduction to Electricity Market of India
items.headline: Fundamentals of Indian Power Market- Open Access, Power Exchange, Captive Power Plant, Scheduling of Power, PPA/PSA

Open Access
Power Exchange

items.title: Conflict Resolution in Leadership and Talent Management
items.headline: Applying proper conflict resolution skills to de-escalate tense situations involving your team members/direct reports
objectives_summary: How to effectively address and de-escalate conflicts with your talent
How to analyze your team members' rules and how to avoid breaking them
How to mediate tense situations between third parties

items.title: Risk Management for Medical Office Staff
items.headline: Protecting the Practice from Litigation
objectives_summary: Understand how they can manage numerous risks in the modern office medical practice
Appreciate the legal concept of respondeat superior and the fact that physicians and other providers can be held responsible for the actions of medical office staff
Avoid potential torts in their workplace, including assault and battery, false imprisonment and invasion of privacy, and defamation of character

objectives_summary: Purpose/ Basic description of ISO 14001:2015

objectives_summary: Think like a manager

Create a climate that brings out the best in your people

items.title: Coaching Skills For Retail Managers
items.headline: Skills and Techniques For Helping Employees Close Performance Gaps
objectives_summary: Coach retail employees effectively.  Students will learn how to implement basic coaching techniques and how to use advanced coaching skills to help employees close performance gaps.
